title: Five-Star InterContinental São Paulo Stay with Outdoor Pool & Stylish Cocktail Bar
description: Located in the chic Jardins neighbourhood, adjacent to hip Pinheiros, the five-star InterContinental São Paulo, an IHG Hotel is idyllically placed for exploring the city's top attractions, cosy cafés and trendy nightlife. Before setting out to explore, stop in at the cosmopolitan Godet Bar for a cocktail, or indulge in São Paulo's famed gastronomy at Tarsila Restaurant. When it comes to leisure, all bases are covered with an outdoor swimming pool, 24-hour fitness centre and a dedicated concierge to help you plan.
location_description: InterContinental São Paulo, an IHG Hotel

title: Modern São Paulo City Escape with Outdoor Pool & Onsite Dining
description:
Experience refined sophistication in the heart of São Paulo’s elegant Jardins district, surrounded by leafy boulevards and designer boutiques. Just steps away, discover the renowned Rua Oscar Freire, home to luxury fashion houses and chic cafes, or wander to Ibirapuera Park for tranquil lakes, sculpture gardens and the Museum of Modern Art.

Return to contemporary comfort, where the onsite restaurant serves Brazilian classics with a cosmopolitan twist, and the outdoor pool offers sun-soaked relaxation. Explore nearby culinary gems such as D.O.M. by acclaimed chef Alex Atala or enjoy artisanal pastries at Pão bakery on Alameda Lorena.
offer_address: Alameda Campinas, 1435 Jardim Paulista, São Paulo 01404002, Brazil
